pageContext.claim: “But what he did on the borders, and this is without the wall -- by the way, the wall is happening, folks, OK. Believe me, the wall is happening. In fact, you probably saw, you know, we have a wall up there now and we're renovating it already, it's being made pristine, perfect, just as good as new, although we may go a little bit higher than that, but that's OK. And we're building samples of the new wall.”
pageContext.analysis: The Customs and Border Protection announced it would repair existing fencing, but this is nowhere near the signature campaign promise by Trump to build a border wall.
